subject: Hockey, Ice
lead_paragraph: Led by Pittsburgh Penguins center Sidney Crosby and Washington Capitals wing Alex Ovechkin, 20 players are making their first N.H.L. All-Star Game appearance.
snippet: Led by Pittsburgh Penguins center Sidney Crosby and Washington Capitals wing Alex Ovechkin, 20 players are making their first N.H.L. All-Star Game appearance.
